docs.text: gh release Testing github actions based CI and release process for python/poetry based projects. This has no real use in its own right - its a test platform for me to play with... Current Version Version: 0.4.0
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: Testing github actions based CI and release process for python/poetry based projects. This has no real use in its own right - its a test platform for me to play with...
docs.title: gh release

docs.text: Version: 0.4.0
docs.title: Current Version

docs.text: Changelog All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file. The format is based on Keep a Changelog and this project adheres to Semantic Versioning . v0.4.0 (2022-01-26) Feature Full lifecycle github actions ( eed6957 ) Fix Filter on deploy ci ( d54663b ) Deployment secrets ( 9bfaa07 ) Correct ci tests ( 3f87b67 ) Correct tests version checking ( 44d2e95 ) Documentation Added a set of fake filler documentation ( f473306 ) v0.3.0 (2022-01-24) Feature Try to move setup phase into its own workflow ( 3cfe119 ) Fix Rework setup code into a separate action ( 13b2e3a ) v0.2.4 (2022-01-24) Fix Attempt to dual cache with simplification ( dfa16c9 ) v0.2.3 (2022-01-24) Fix It appears only one active cache works... ( c0b26d2 ) v0.2.2 (2022-01-24) Fix Perturb cache key ( ec27a96 ) v0.2.1 (2022-01-24) Fix Put cache back ( 498d0c5 ) Find out where poetry puts things ( 1dc02ac ) Correct some venv issues ( 668b894 ) Move venv to make it cache correctly ( 054b592 ) v0.2.0 (2022-01-24) Feature Github upload of release package ( ae314e6 ) Fix Turn check_build_status off ( 42552c0 ) Modify build parameters ( f60ca7d ) Try changing poetry path ( e74567d ) Another attempt... ( 8810337 ) Another attempt to handle build within python-smantic-release ( 89aa02a ) v0.1.2 (2022-01-23) Fix Fix github token name ( 837fc2f ) Move virtenvs into project for caching ( fe1d8e5 ) v0.1.1 (2022-01-23) Fix Hash the action naming ( 199115c ) v0.1.0 (2022-01-23) Feature Rework for internal releaser ( 91a0e64 ) Rework to use our python-semantic-release ( 709d449 ) v0.1.0 (2022-01-23) Feature Rework for internal releaser ( 91a0e64 ) Rework to use our python-semantic-release ( 709d449 ) v0.0.4 (2022-01-23) Fix Force dist to exist for semantic release ( 5b165c7 ) v0.0.3 (2022-01-23) Fix Do not upload release to repository ( c5fc0dc ) v0.0.2 (2022-01-23)
